sentences.sContent: They encourage an image of the region as an otherworldly sort of place.
sentences.sCn: 他们想为这个地区营造出一个世外桃源的形象。

words.tran: 来世；冥间；理想世界；空想

trans.tranCn: 来世的, 修来世的, 专注于精神方面的
trans.tranOther: Otherworldly people, things, and places seem strange or spiritual, and not much connected with ordinary things
